roleset.name: perspire
roleset.note: SWEAT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'sweat' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. Corresponds to VN classes substance_emission-43.4, breathe-40.1.2. (from sweat.01-v)

roles.note: Arg1 defaults to 'sweat' and so only occurs when something else(metaphorically) is being swat. (from sweat.01-v)

role.descr: sweater (no, not like your grandmother made for you)

example.name: sweat-v: manner, not arg!
example.text: Mr. Jacobson, his gray hair flying, didn't wear out his red-white-and-blue sneakers, but he sweat so much he considered sending out for a new shirt.
example.arg: so much he considered sending out for a new shirt

example.name: sweat-v: with arg1
example.text: Before his big date with Mary, John was sweating bullets.
example.arg: Before his big date with Mary

example.name: sweat-v: both args
example.text: *PRO* do n't sweat it . sat / sun / mon ...

role.descr: thing endured or period of time

example.name: sweat_out-v: not like a sauna
example.text: Baseball fans throughout New York had sweated out a long summer with their teams, and now it had come to this: a battle between the two for the National League pennant -- down to the last inning of the last game, no less.

roleset.name: remove by sweating
roleset.note: SWEAT_OFF-V NOTES: predicate added by Arrick (from sweat.03-v)

example.name: sweat_off-v: not unlike a sauna
example.text: [Sellers]-1 would often spend two hours inside *PRO*-1 pooling or sweating off extra pounds.

roleset.name: covered in sweat
roleset.note: SWEATY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from sweaty.01-j)

example.name: sweaty-j
example.text: They love to give me a hug even when I am all sweaty
